name: Lyumina's Love Bomb
description:
Made for GBJAM 10.

The people of the city refuse to realize how amazing Lyumina is, and now she has to make them with love bombs. Plant a bomb in each stage without being seen! Lyumina's Love Bomb is a simple puzzle game that I think will be developed into a full sized game in the future. (WARNING: The first enemy (also appearing in the last stage) is completely random so stay strong and forgive me.)

Move L/R - Left, Right, A, D
Jump - X, L
Interact - Z,K
Start - Enter
Toggle Music - Shift
